trans-unit.source: Contains static methods for retrieving custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 包含擷取自訂屬性的靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute that is applied to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至指定之項目的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的組件。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定型別的自訂屬性，此屬性套用至指定組件。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute that matches <paramref name="attributeType" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no such attribute is found.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的自訂屬性，如果找不到這類屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> extension method if you expect more than one value to be returned, or <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您預期會傳回一個以上的值，請使用 <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> 擴充方法，否則將擲回 <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: More than one of the requested attributes was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個以上要求的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The member to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的成員。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified member.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定型別的自訂屬性，此屬性套用至指定成員。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute that matches <paramref name="attributeType" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no such attribute is found.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的自訂屬性，如果找不到這類屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> extension method if you expect more than one value to be returned, or <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您預期會傳回一個以上的值，請使用 <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> 擴充方法，否則將擲回 <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a constructor, method, property, event, type, or field.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是建構函式、方法、屬性、事件、型別或欄位。

trans-unit.source: More than one of the requested attributes was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個以上要求的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: The module to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的模型。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified module.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定型別的自訂屬性，此屬性套用至指定模組。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute that matches <paramref name="attributeType" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no such attribute is found.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的自訂屬性，如果找不到這類屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> extension method if you expect more than one value to be returned, or <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您預期會傳回一個以上的值，請使用 <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> 擴充方法，否則將擲回 <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: More than one of the requested attributes was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個以上要求的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The parameter to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的參數。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定型別的自訂屬性，此屬性套用至指定參數。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute that matches <paramref name="attributeType" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no such attribute is found.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的自訂屬性，如果找不到這類屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> extension method if you expect more than one value to be returned, or <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您預期會傳回一個以上的值，請使用 <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> 擴充方法，否則將擲回 <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: More than one of the requested attributes was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個以上要求的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: The member to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的成員。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to inspect the ancestors of <c>element</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示檢查 <c>項目</c> 的祖系；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified member, and optionally inspects the ancestors of that member.
trans-unit.target: 擷取只訂型別的自訂屬性，此屬性套用至指定成員，並且可選擇性檢查該成員的祖系。

trans-unit.source: The module to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的模型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of custom attributes that are applied to a specified module.
trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至指定模組的自訂屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the custom attributes that are applied to <paramref name="element" />, or an empty collection if no such attributes exist.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的集合，這些屬性已套用至 <paramref name="element" />，如果沒有這類屬性存在，則為空集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameter to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的參數。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of custom attributes that are applied to a specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至指定參數的自訂屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the custom attributes that are applied to <paramref name="element" />, or an empty collection if no such attributes exist.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的集合，這些屬性已套用至 <paramref name="element" />，如果沒有這類屬性存在，則為空集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a constructor, method, property, event, type, or field.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是建構函式、方法、屬性、事件、型別或欄位。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的組件。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of custom attributes of a specified type that are applied to a specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定型別的自訂屬性集合，此集合套用至指定組件。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the custom attributes that are applied to <paramref name="element" /> and that match <paramref name="attributeType" />, or an empty collection if no such attributes exist.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的集合，這些屬性已套用至 <paramref name="element" /> 且符合 <paramref name="attributeType" />；如果沒有這類屬性存在，則為空集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The member to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to inspect the ancestors of <c>element</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示檢查 <c>項目</c> 的祖系；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of custom attributes that are applied to a specified member, and optionally inspects the ancestors of that member.
trans-unit.target: 擷取自訂屬性集合，此集合套用至指定成員，並且可選擇性檢查該成員的祖系。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the custom attributes that are applied to <paramref name="element" /> that match the specified criteria, or an empty collection if no such attributes exist.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的集合，這些屬性已套用至符合指定之準則的 <paramref name="element" />，如果沒有這樣的屬性則為空集合。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a constructor, method, property, event, type, or field.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是建構函式、方法、屬性、事件、型別或欄位。

trans-unit.source: The module to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的模型。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified module.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否將所指定型別的自訂屬性套用至指定的模組。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an attribute of the specified type is applied to <paramref name="element" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的型別的屬性套用至 <paramref name="element" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameter to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的參數。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否將所指定型別的自訂屬性套用至指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an attribute of the specified type is applied to <paramref name="element" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的型別的屬性套用至 <paramref name="element" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The member to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的成員。

trans-unit.source: The type of the attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to inspect the ancestors of <c>element</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示檢查 <c>項目</c> 的祖系；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified member, and, optionally, applied to its ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定之型別的自訂屬性是否會套用至指定的成員，以及選擇性地套用到其上階。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an attribute of the specified type is applied to <paramref name="element" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
